00034 // possible actions for selected/current songs
00035 // caution: corresponds to order in YammiGui::setPreferences
00036 enum action {   None, Enqueue, EnqueueAsNext, PlayNow, SongInfo,
00037                             PrelistenStart, PrelistenMiddle, PrelistenEnd,
00038                             Delete, DeleteFile, DeleteEntry,
00039                             CheckConsistency, CopyTo, MoveTo, CopyAsWavTo,

00049 class Song

00063     bool checkFilename() { return (constructFilename()==filename); };

00074     QString location() { return this->path+"/"+this->filename; }

00099     int genreNr;                                                        // genre
00100 
00101     // file and mp3-layer info

00103     QString path;                                                       // path to file, excluding filename, no trailing slash
00104     unsigned long filesize;                                 // filesize in bytes
00105     int length;                                                         // length of song in seconds
00106     
00107     // additional database info

00109     MyDateTime lastPlayed;                                  // last time song was played
00110     int noPlayed;                                                       // how often song was played since added
00111     QStringList mediaName;
